body.p: In the scenario Filters tab you can add filters to remove certain content elements from the generated output.
There are three ways to define filters:

ul.li: Use profiling condition set - sets the profiling condition setprofiling condition set that applies to the document you transform;

Exclude from output all elements with any of the following attributes - you can configure a simple list of attribute (name, value) pairs which when present on an element in the input will remove it from output.
